original_text: Now when Daniel knew that the writing was signed, he went into his house; and his windows being open in his chamber toward Jerusalem, he kneeled upon his knees three times a day, and prayed, and gave thanks before his God, as he did aforetime.
korean_text: 다니엘이 이 조서에 왕의 도장이 찍힌 것을 알고도 자기 집에 돌아가서는 윗방에 올라가 예루살렘으로 향한 창문을 열고 전에 하던 대로 하루 세 번씩 무릎을 꿇고 기도하며 그의 하나님께 감사하였더라

sentences.original_text: Now when Daniel knew that writing was signed
sentences.korean_translation: 다니엘이 그 조서에 인을 찍었다는 것을 알았을 때

sentences.original_text: and his windows being open in his chamber toward Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 다락방 창문이 예루살렘을 향해 열려 있었는데

sentences.original_text: he kneeled upon his knees three times a day
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하루 세 번 무릎을 꿇고

sentences.original_text: and gave thanks before his God
